text: Roni Shimrich (; born 15 August 1993) is an Israeli footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Israel women's national team. ==Career== Shimrich has been capped for the Israel national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli women's footballers Category:Israel women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Jewish footballers Category:Israeli Jews Category:Ashkenazi Jews
title: Roni Shimrich
